video.title: Urban Legends
video.synopsis: Each episode of this interactive series presents dramatizations of three urban legends, leaving viewers to figure out which are actually true.

episodes.synopsis: A couple faces a blazing inferno, a mayor receives a package with horrifying contents, and a suicide attempt goes terribly awry.
episodes.title: Best Laid Plans

episodes.synopsis: A disabled man befriends a chicken, an ambitious reporter stumbles upon a terrible secret, and a financial adviser gets the surprise of his life.
episodes.title: Expect the Unexpected

episodes.synopsis: A woman endures a night of terror, a fisherman reels in an unbelievable coincidence, and a high school football team's hazing ritual goes wrong.
episodes.title: Stranger Than Fiction

episodes.synopsis: A desperate woman sets her sights on a baby, frisky hitchhikers get a shock, and a family honoring their late mother gets an unpleasant surprise.
episodes.title: Stolen Dreams

episodes.synopsis: A cheerleader with a dark secret goes missing, a potbellied pig comes to the rescue, and a reclusive artist's work creates a scandal.
episodes.title: More Than Meets the Eye

episodes.synopsis: A raucous bachelor party has sobering consequences, a lottery drawing generates too many winners, and a victimized carpet salesman gets the blame.
episodes.title: Heads or Tails

episodes.synopsis: A man gets a text message from beyond the grave, a little lie leads to a big surgical mishap, and a lawyer's online romance costs him dearly.
episodes.title: Reap What You Sow

episodes.synopsis: A transplant recipient has a change of heart, a circus clown's joke tragically backfires, and a couple's newfound wealth yields deadly consequences.
episodes.title: Love and War

episodes.synopsis: A cop hunts for a female serial killer, one man cheats death time and again, and an adulterous couple finds a surprising solution to their problems.
episodes.title: Close Calls

episodes.synopsis: A rich stockbroker hides the secret to his success, a grieving family gets a post-funeral shock, and a bus driver is accused of a wild crime spree.
episodes.title: Under Wraps

episodes.synopsis: A woman's obsession with dolls gets out of hand, a popular DJ disappears without a trace, and a medical student's antics come back to haunt her.
episodes.title: Blink of an Eye

episodes.synopsis: A bartender gets a life-or-death tip, a family secret waits to tear apart a young couple, and a killer gets creative in his attempts to elude justice.
episodes.title: Missing Pieces

episodes.synopsis: A vacationing family receives a terrifying wake-up call, a man who rescues an abandoned baby gets a shock, and a fairy tale romance turns dark.
episodes.title: Out of the Blue

episodes.synopsis: A TV show leaves a model starving for more than fame, a woman tells her ex-husband he has a daughter, and an old letter exposes a terrible secret.
episodes.title: The Terrible Truth

episodes.synopsis: A cop's investigation leads him back home, a secret from his mother's past saves a man's life, and an online friendship reveals a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: Skeletons in the Closet
